author: Gwen Clarke
content:
This is a blatant disregard for procedures and operating standards.
I sincerely hope that the company will pay the Mauritian Government big bucs for this dereliction of duties.and extensive damage to the environment.

author: ws
content:
How could this happen… Hatch covers built like bank vault doors!
Designed on the back other bulk carrier’s failures!
I have a WiFi hot spot in front of my house..
Car’s & trucks stop all the time, Loud, yammering, cellphone Lillians..

author: Willy
content: Oy! I hope the crew that made these foolish decisions for wifi are unable to get any future employment / are encarcerated. What a terrible lack of judgement.
